column1: COVID-19 cases are rising dramatically across the country.  We cannot let our guard down.   We must continue wearing masks washing our hands and socially distancing.  Together we will get through this.

This #Halloween wear a mask social distance avoid large social gatherings and HAVE FUN!   Visit CDC guidelines for #COVID safety: https://t.co/RQ2yvRaYjN   Together we can end the pandemic! https://t.co/hzPDIC6Fka

🚨¡Estoy EN VIVO! 🚨  Únase a mí LIVE ahora mientras discutimos lo último sobre COVID-19 y otros asuntos que son importantes para nuestra comunidad del sur de la Florida.  Sintonice ahora: https://t.co/1D5HeJkC31

🚨I'm LIVE on Facebook!🚨  Join me now as we discuss the latest on COVID-19 and other matters that are important to our South Florida community.  Tune in now: https://t.co/1D5HeJkC31 https://t.co/vys8v7rCDL
President Trump's decision to stop negotiating a COVID-19 relief package is outrageous and indefensible.  This isn't a reality show. People's lives are at stake.

Le invito MAÑANA a las 6:00 pm a mi Facebook LIVE.  Quiero mantenerlo informado y responder cualquier pregunta que pueda tener con respecto al COVID-19 las últimas acciones para controlar la pandemia en FL y lo que podemos esperar de Washington.  Visite: https://t.co/1D5HeJkC31

#SoFla: join me TOMORROW at 6:00pm for my Facebook LIVE TownHall.  I want to keep you informed & answer any questions you may have regarding COVID-19 the latest actions to control the pandemic in FL and what we can expect from Washington.  Tune in here: https://t.co/1D5HeJkC31 https://t.co/d7tbCXAD97

President Trump testing positive for COVID-19 makes it clear that this virus can affect anyone. We must all continue to do our part by wearing a mask and washing our hands.  Wishing him and the First Lady a swift and healthy recovery.

💉COVID-19 forma parte de la lista de epidemias transmitidas por animales.  Debemos actuar ahora para prevenir el próximo brote. Es por eso que estoy trabajando para tomar medidas contra el comercio/mercados de vida silvestre y para reducir su demanda como alimento.

💉COVID-19 is the latest in a long line of animal-borne epidemics.  We must act now to prevent the next outbreak. That’s why I’m working to #PreventFuturePandemics by cracking down on wildlife trade/markets and improving global food systems to reduce demand for wildlife as food. https://t.co/FJWm9YHqgk

¡Le invito este 6 de octubre a mi tele-ayuntamiento!  Estaré en Facebook LIVE discutiendo lo último sobre un paquete de alivio de COVID-19 incluyendo un segundo estímulo actualizaciones sobre una vacuna y responderé cualquier pregunta e inquietud que pueda tener.  Hora: 6:00 PM

Join me on Tuesday for my Video TownHall!  I will be on Facebook LIVE discussing the latest on a COVID-19 relief package including a second stimulus check updates on a vaccine and answer any questions and concerns you may have.  Time: 6:00 PM Where: https://t.co/WFXoO4sD9o https://t.co/ANu0leifNb

El gobernador DeSantis está poniendo en peligro nuestras comunidades por priorizar los negocios sobre la salud de nuestras familias.  Nos arriesgamos a perder más vidas a causa de COVID-19 debido a los actos imprudentes de nuestro gobernador. Florida se merece algo mejor.

Gov. DeSantis is endangering our communities by prioritizing business over the health of our families.  We risk losing more lives to COVID-19 because of our Governor’s reckless acts. Florida deserves better.  https://t.co/rtzSEDDu3z

Durante estos tiempos difíciles busco mantenerlo informado y preparado para combatir #COVID19.  Puede encontrar información y recursos útiles en mi sitio web: https://t.co/W3svIMfvKh  Manténgase informado suscribiéndose a mis boletines electrónicos: https://t.co/DA9t4XdLdG

During these difficult times I look to keep our #SoFla communities informed & prepared to combat #COVID19.  General info & helpful resources can be found on my website: https://t.co/W3svIMfvKh  Remain informed by signing up to my e-newsletters: https://t.co/Z48ZT2075L https://t.co/JRlphyONl5

Con más de 167000 casos positivos de #COVID19 en Miami-Dade y meses sin poder contener el virus el gobernador DeSantis ha decidido reabrir por completo bares y restaurantes.  Necesitamos un líder que se preocupe por los floridanos no les desee buena suerte.

With over 167000 #COVID19 cases in Miami-Dade and months of failing to contain the virus Gov. DeSantis has decided to fully reopen bars and restaurants.  We need a leader that will care for Floridians not wish them good luck.  https://t.co/cw7d8JUtAf

A medida que más escuelas hacen la transición al aprendizaje virtual continuaremos viendo aumentos en los ciberataques. El próximo proyecto de ley de ayuda #COVID19 DEBE incluir fondos específicos para proteger a nuestros estudiantes.

As more schools shift to virtual learning we will continue to see increases in cyberattacks. Our next #COVID19 relief bill MUST include targeted funds to protect our students.   Read my bipartisan letter to Congressional leaders w/ @RepPeteKing @GerryConnolly & @RepJohnLarson. https://t.co/2Laa7dajjW

El presidente Trump dijo que COVID-19 desaparecería.  En lugar de desaparecer se han perdido 200.000 vidas estadounidenses y más de 68 millones se han enfermado.  Si hubieran tomado esta pandemia en serio desde el principio miles podrían haberse salvado. #FailThePeople

President Trump said COVID-19 would disappear.  Instead of disappearing 200000 American lives have been lost & over 6.8 million have fallen ill.  If Republicans had taken this pandemic seriously from the start thousands of Americans could have been saved. #FailThePeople https://t.co/0upNgnneaM

This #SmallBusinessWeek we recognize the small businesses in #FL27 that have supported our community during #COVID19.  I’m working in Washington for small firms to have the resources they need and I’m committed to supporting policies that help our entrepreneurs recover. https://t.co/kR9mQcYc4u

The scientists and experts at the CDC should write the guidelines for COVID-19 testing not politicians.  Whoever was responsible for this decision not only undermined our efforts to combat this virus they cost many people their lives.   https://t.co/uFK29BAR7p

Este Mes Nacional de la Herencia Hispana honramos las muchas contribuciones de los latinos e hispanoamericanos a nuestra nación.   En medio de la pandemia de #COVID19 los latinos están demostrando ser más esenciales que nunca y resistentes frente a la adversidad. #HHM

This #HispanicHeritageMonth we honor Latino and Hispanic Americans’ many contributions to our nation.   Amidst the #COVID19 pandemic Latinos are proving themselves more essential than ever and resilient in the face of adversity. #HHM https://t.co/eXa7Jjj6Yg

We have already killed a generation of seniors with COVID-19 but climate change will kill many more.  Just our scientists and public health officials have worked tirelessly to combat this virus we must preparing the same scale of national mobilization to tackle climate change. https://t.co/QlX2HIpTap

Instead of:  Helping the frontline heroes in state & local government…  Feeding hungry families…  Helping renters keep their homes…  Ensuring all can vote safely…  Republicans are proposing a “check the box” vote on an emaciated COVID-19 “plan?”  No thanks. #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/mF9GB9Tc84

Today marks the beginning of #SuicidePreventionAwarenessWeek.  A recent poll shows 50%+ of Americans admit the #COVID19 pandemic has had a negative impact on their #MentalHealth. It's critical to reach out to those you think may be struggling. #NotAlone  https://t.co/lK7NGpSwWb https://t.co/S7eviJEFFV

Miami-Dade County has one of the most unaffordable rental markets in the country.   Congress must enact a new COVID relief bill with emergency rental assistance to protect Miami-Dade residents and millions nationwide that are unable to cover back rent. https://t.co/l2RZXoGk1w

Instead putting #FamiliesFirst the President has devoted himself to dismissing facts and ignoring the advice of experts.  More than 6 million Americans have tested positive for COVID-19. Republicans must meet Democrats halfway and come back to the negotiating table. https://t.co/fuarNEjCDN
Today I spent time distributing masks at a free COVID-19 testing site in Little Havana.  More testing and contact tracing will help us save lives and keep our loved ones safe. https://t.co/BvabUBwux6
More than 10000 people have now died in Florida from the coronavirus and Ron DeSantis still does not have a plan to get things under control.  This is what failed leadership looks like.

Senate Republicans and President Trump refuse to take responsibility for their wrongdoings.  We lack leadership during this #COVID19 pandemic the President is calling the virus a hoax as people continue to be hospitalized lose employment businesses shutting down and more.
Coronavirus is killing more young Floridians every day but Gov. Ron DeSantis insists that we reopen schools before it is safe.  This will only end in tragedy.  https://t.co/FoZKIgqkmO

Women make up 52% of essential workers during the #COVID19 pandemic.  And Women of Color - including Latinas - are the most likely to work in low-wage jobs where they are being shortchanged by a combined gender and racial wage gap.  We need #HealthEquity for Women of Color. https://t.co/jsqspGyswJ

➡️4.9 million cases. ➡️160000 dead. ➡️55 million first-time unemployment claims.  President Trump’s #FailuretoLead left millions infected thousands dead & the worst economic disaster since the Great Depression. #COVID19

Rent is due & many families don't know how they're going to make payments amid #COVID19.  The Republican Senate's failure to act means that millions could soon lose the roofs over their heads.  We must extend the eviction moratorium & provide urgently needed rent relief. https://t.co/jKM0QdDBUN

John may be gone but his struggle is not over. As we celebrate 55 years of the Voting Rights Act our work to ensure access to the ballot goes on.  We must pass the John R. Lewis Voting Rights Act and give states the resources to #ProtectOurVote amid the COVID-19 crisis. #VRA55 https://t.co/N8q6CeDPS2

Permanezcamos en contacto durante esta crisis.  Como su representante en Washington D.C. quiero asegurarme de que esté al tanto sobre la pandemia de #COVID19 legislación federal que pueda ayudarle durante este momento difícil y más.  Registrese aquí: https://t.co/Z48ZT2075L

Rolling out a coronavirus vaccine quickly and safely will be a big challenge for our country.  That is why I'm proposing we do a nationwide test run with the flu vaccine in the fall.  This is best way to make sure we can effectively roll out a COVID-19 vaccine once it is approved https://t.co/JVtziM2GpK

During these difficult times I look to keep our #SoFla communities informed & prepared to combat #COVID19.  General info & helpful resources can be found on my website: https://t.co/XKcSWfAl7a  Remain informed by signing up to my weekly e-newsletters: https://t.co/Z48ZT1IvHb https://t.co/IutvCnUZRG
This pandemic has been raging for months.  Until we have a national plan and standards to address the coronavirus our country's economy and its people will continue to suffer. https://t.co/y4Bc9gzuw9

The COVID-19 pandemic has made it clear that we need better and more uniform standards across the country when it comes to reporting vital statistics and deaths.  I am proud to have included an amendment in today's minibus with my colleague @RepVanTaylor to do just that.

At @COVIDOversight’s first briefing bipartisan experts identified comprehensive testing tracing & targeted containment as key requirements to a safe reopening.  Over two months later we have no #NationalStrategy & are seeing spikes in #COVID19 cases deaths & hospitalizations.

(1/2) Thank you everyone who joined the video town hall this evening!  I enjoyed answering your questions & listening to your concerns.  Keep up to date on the latest on #COVID19 and my work in Washington by signing up to my weekly enewsletter here: https://t.co/Z48ZT2075L https://t.co/ptJOjl3QKH

The #OrtegaMurillo regime continues to violate #HumanRights in #Nicaragua.  The int'l community will not ignore your latest responses on #COVID19 and your disregard for the lives of fellow countrymen. We'll take action to remove you & restore democracy.  https://t.co/D4TonIPC0Z

Los expertos en salud pública han dejado claro que la crisis de COVID-19 podría empeorar aún más en otoño.  La gente DEBE poder votar de manera segura en noviembre. Debemos dar a los estados los recursos y fondos que necesitan para #ProtegerNuestroVoto.

Public health experts have made it clear that the COVID-19 crisis could get even worse this fall.   People MUST be able to vote safely in November. We must give states the resources and funding they need to #ProtectOurVote. https://t.co/N3ie1wBmE6

Trump & Republican Senators have dragged their feet for 9 weeks. And while they have refused to abandon their one-sided “pause” on responding to COVID-19 millions of Americans have gotten sick & lost their jobs.  Pass the #HeroesAct NOW!
With millions of cases nationwide we have ALL been personally victimized by #COVID19.   Mask up & stop the spread of this pandemic. #OnWednesdaysWeWearPink https://t.co/nzAhGSgnDY

W/ new #COVID19 cases rising to over 70000 per day the highest number of cases since the start of the pandemic and infection & hospitalization rates increasing in various U.S. states Trump must finally use the full power of the Defense Production Act to address PPE shortages. https://t.co/Wxz0Hi6kRe

COVID-19 is out of control in Florida but Gov. DeSantis is insisting schools reopen in August.  I suspect the only reason he refuses to act and continue pretending he has this crisis under control is to please President Trump.   If true he has no business leading anyone.

La #LeyCARES pasó hace meses para ayudarle y a las empresas a mantenerse financieramente seguros durante #COVID19.  Los demócratas también aprobaron #HEROESAct pero los republicanos optaron por reabrir. Una terrible decisión.  Debemos cerrar y extender asistencia INMEDIATAMENTE.

The #CARESAct passed months ago to help Americans & businesses remain financially safe amid #COVID19.  House Dems passed the #HEROESAct but republicans opted to reopen too early. A terrible decision.  We must close & extend fed. assistance IMMEDIATELY.  https://t.co/mzDHGdGo3H

With COVID-19 infection rates spiraling out of control I want to thank all the health care workers - the nurses doctors and support staff - who are working tirelessly to combat this virus.  Thank you for everything you are doing to keep us safe.  #ThankfulThursday https://t.co/XKR9TyIdwu
